channel.title: Demonic Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Demonic Recruiting" - Demonic is coming back

item.title: Re: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: I bought the Alter today will be summoning EvilTaxi to day around 5 server time so if you want to get in on the beating come join us, after he dies we will summon another and so on I will summon as fast as they die

item.title: Re: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: We have 32 members and should be able to Summon EvilTaxi Friday if not then sure by Saturday so come join Demonic Village if you want your chance at some drops

item.title: Re: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: ok we have 28 member really just need 2 more , would really perfer some T3 users or atleast Sanin that like to kill Kaiju

item.title: Re: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Starting to look for Stronger players we are at 25 members need 5 more to buy Enticement Altar once there I will Summon Kaiju Back to Back, so T3 users or anyone that likes to fight Kaiju Feel Free to come bye and help out

item.title: Re: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: We got our first Kaiju today and hit 21 members looking for some stronger players to join and help hunt monsters, looks like tha kage might be killing this one alone so if you like to fight them come on over and give a hand once I have strong members and have 30 members I'll be summoning monsters

item.title: Re: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Alright we are up to 5 members till need more once we hit 23 we are NRF already have the upgrade juyst needs activated

item.title: Demonic Recruiting
item.content:encoded: Ok I'm proud to say my alt just got to take over Demonic Village, good news we have 60 Upgrades and are looking for anyone and everyone to come join us, Bad news all upgrades are disabled untill you come join us we are in real need of members to activate our upgrades thanks to everyone that can come help out
